UP Police Constable Online Form 2026 – Apply for 32,679 Posts

Post Date: 7 January 2026 | Last Date: 31 January 2026

Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has started the online application process for UP Police Constable Recruitment 2026. A total of 32,679 vacancies are announced. Eligible candidates can apply online from 31 December 2025 to 30 January 2026.

Important Dates

  • Application Begin : 7 January 2026
  • Last Date for Apply Online : 31 January 2026
  • Application Start Date : 30 December 2025
  • Last Date to Apply Online / Fee Payment : 30 January 2026
  • Fee Adjustment Date : 2 February 2026

Application Fee

  • General / EWS / OBC: ₹500 SC / ST: ₹400 Payment Mode: Debit Card, Credit Card, Internet Banking, IMPS, Wallet
  • Payment Mode : Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking
UP Police Constable Online Form 2026 – Apply for 32,679 Posts : Age Limit as on 2026
  • Minimum Age : 18 Years
  • Maximum Age : Minimum Age: 18 Years Maximum Age: 25 Years (UR / EWS – Male) 28 Years (UR / EWS – Female) 30 Years (OBC / SC / ST – Male) 33 Years (OBC / SC / ST – Female) Age calculated as on 01 July 2025. Age relaxation is applicable as per UP Police rules. Years
  • Age Relaxation Extra as per Rules

How to Fill Form
  • Candidate Read the Notification Before Apply the Recruitment Application Form in Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB).
  • Kindly Check and Collect the All Document - Eligibility, ID Proof, Address Details, Basic Details.
  • Kindly Ready Scan Document Related to Recruitment Form - Photo, Sign, ID Proof, Etc.
  • Before Submit the Application Form Must Check the Preview and All Column Carefully.
  • Take A Print Out of Final Submitted Form.
